name: Elite Boat Master Battle Chest
description: Elita Boat Master Battle Chest is a 1v1 battle game, in which you have to battle your friend in order to secure the control over the seas. Each boat have 5 lives. Once destroyed you will respawn randomly on the screen within few seconds. Be careful not to be in the reach of your opponent. The first boat moves with z,q,d and shoots with e. The second boat moves with the arrow keys and shoots with the spacebar.
